ygData.subject: UGuk Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a couple questions about UGuk: I went in there with some friends of mine (me-L24 bard, L21 mage, L29 druid, L26 druid), and we d none of us been in
ygData.messageBody:
I have a couple questions about UGuk:

I went in there with some friends of mine (me-L24 bard, L21 mage, L29 druid,
L26 druid), and we'd none of us been in there before, so the froggies were
not aggro to any of us. While we were there, we met someone who said he's
show us where this particular creature spawned (mage was wanting to complete
a part of her quest and it had an item she needed). Anyway, this person was
KOS to most things inside as he'd been hunting in there for a while. One of
our druids was going to cast invis/see invis on him (and see invis on the
rest of us) when he's attacked by something, and one of our druids casts see
invis on him exactly the same time. Then the creatures started attacking us!

So: Did they attack us because one of the druids cast see invis on him while
he was defending himself??? Our 21mage stayed back and didn't do anything
while we helped our "guide" defend himself but the 29druid, and myself DID
help (actually, I had to defend myself, because, when they turned to attack,
they attacked me and the 29druid). The 26 druid also helped by joining in
the fight, yet her faction didn't seem to be affected (i.e. she can stand in
there uninvised and not be attacked). And, the mage's faction took no hits
whatsoever. Anyway, anyone have any ideas what was going on with this? Oddly
enough, when I am standing there, they are just dubious to me, and when I
sing the invis song, they are indifferent to me, so it seems my faction
wasn't adjusted THAT much.
